definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: Singh raves about Lane's performance as Brighton.
sentences.chinese: 辛格讚揚Lane的表演就是布萊頓。

sentences.english: Birds fly over oil on the water near Breton Sound Island.
sentences.chinese: 一大羣鳥飛越靠近布萊頓水聲島的油漬水域。

sentences.english: I think Bournemouth 's a much nicer town than Brighton.
sentences.chinese: 渤恩慕是一個比布萊頓好得多的城市。

sentences.english: I'm getting the car ready for the London to Brighton race now.
sentences.chinese: 現在我正爲參加從倫敦開到布萊頓的比賽作準備。

sentences.english: He built a bathing pavilion, and named the area Brighton Beach, for the English seaside resort.
sentences.chinese: 這塊地被他開發成海濱浴場，並命名爲布萊頓沙灘。

sentences.english: I think Bourn mouths a much nicer town than Brighton.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲渤恩慕是一個比布萊頓好得多的城市。

sentences.english: “Jugs” was the Lewes slang for Brighton folk.
sentences.chinese: “朱格斯”是布萊頓民間的俚語。

sentences.english: One weekend, we took a trip to Brighton.
sentences.chinese: 一次週末我們來到布萊頓。

sentences.english: Brighton is the Queen's henchman, who she sends to kill Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 布萊頓是女王的心腹，一個被派去殺白雪公主的人。

sentences.english: Groups of people go on organized outings to popular resorts like Brighton or Black pool.
sentences.chinese: 於是人們便有組織地到布萊頓或黑潭等旅遊勝地遊玩。

sentences.english: It is studying here-----in Brighton that really reminds me of some beautiful memories in my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 在布萊頓大學不禁讓我回想起一些小時候的美好記憶。

sentences.english: It’s been estimated that 13 percent of the population of Brighton is part of the LGBT community.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，布萊頓市13%的人口是同性戀社區的一分子。

sentences.english: Brightly colored bathing boxes line the sand at Brighton Beach.
sentences.chinese: 布萊頓海灘上五顏六色的更衣室排列在沙地上。

pinyin: Bei3 Ka3 luo2 lai2 na4 zhou1
Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
